description: Represents a session within a Flywheel project, including comprehensive metadata and relationships between associated entities.

id.description: The unique identifier for the session.
id.title: Session ID

label.description: A human-readable label for the session.
label.title: Session Label

parents.group.description: The group associated with the session.
parents.group.title: Parent Group

parents.project.description: The project associated with the session.
parents.project.title: Parent Project

parents.subject.description: The subject associated with the session.
parents.subject.title: Parent Subject

created.description: The timestamp when the session was created.
created.title: Creation Timestamp

modified.description: The timestamp when the session was last modified.
modified.title: Last Modified Timestamp

deleted.description: Indicates whether the subject has been deleted.
deleted.title: Deleted

timezone.description: The timezone associated with the session's timestamp, formatted as a standard timezone string (e.g., 'UTC', 'America/New_York').
timezone.title: Session Timezone

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the session, providing context or information about its purpose or details.
notes.title: Session Notes

operator.description: The name or identifier of the operator responsible for the session.
operator.title: Session Operator

uid.description: A unique identifier for the session, typically used for tracking purposes across systems.
uid.title: Session UID

uid_scope.description: The scope or context for the session's unique identifier, providing additional context for its use or meaning.
uid_scope.title: Session UID Scope

satisfies_template.description: Indicates whether the session satisfies the requirements of a defined template.
satisfies_template.title: Satisfies Template

project_has_template.description: Indicates whether the project associated with this session has a defined template.
project_has_template.title: Project Has Template

copy_of.description: The unique identifier of the session that this session is a copy of.
copy_of.title: Copy Of

age.description: The age of the subject at the time of this session, typically measured in seconds.
age.title: Subject Age

timestamp.description: The timestamp for when the session occurred, formatted in ISO 8601 (e.g., 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ').
timestamp.title: Session Timestamp

original_copy_of.description: The unique identifier of the original session that this session is a copy of.
original_copy_of.title: Original Copy Of

source.id.description: The ID of the source object for the subject.
source.id.title: Source ID

source.type.description: The type of the source object for the subject.
source.type.title: Source Type

weight.description: The weight of the subject at the time of this session, typically measured in kilograms.
weight.title: Subject Weight

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the session.
